content: Hi! On slide 40 of the review, what’s the difference between even_or_odd() and even_or_odd in code? We went over it briefly during the session but I did not fully understand it.
subject: review slide 40

content:
<md>even\_or\_odd is just a function definition, so its type is effectively a function. 

 even\_or\_odd() is calling the function, so its type is effectively a Boolean since that is what the function returns after you call it.</md>
